mapper.select: select id as value, name as label from tag where status = 1
select id, name, color from tag where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tag(name, color, status) values(#{name}, #{color}, #{status})
mapper.select: select a.id, title, img, summary, category_id as categoryId, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, c.name as categoryName from article a, category c where a.category_id = c.id and a.id in (select article_id from article_tag where tag_id = #{id}) and a.type >0 and a.status = 1
